description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages. It defines the structure and content of websites.

topics.title: Introduction to HTML
topics.english: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It's the language used for building websites to define content and structure.
topics.hinglish: HTML ka full form HyperText Markup Language hai. Ye website banane ke liye use hoti hai, content aur structure define karti hai.

practice.question: What is the file extension for HTML documents?
What are the main parts of a website?
practice.answer: Head (information for browser) and Body (content for users)

topics.title: HTML Tags & Elements
topics.english: Tags are used to define HTML elements. Most elements have opening and closing tags, while some are self-closing.
topics.hinglish: Tags HTML elements define karte hain. Most elements ke opening aur closing tags hote hain, kuch self-closing hote hain.

practice.question: What is the difference between opening and closing tags?
practice.answer:
Opening tag starts element (

), closing tag ends element (

)

practice.question: Why do we write tag names in lowercase?

topics.title: Basic Page Structure
topics.english: Every HTML document needs proper structure with DOCTYPE, html, head, and body tags for correct rendering.
topics.hinglish: Har HTML document ko sahi structure chahiye - DOCTYPE, html, head, aur body tags se browser sahi render kar sake.

practice.question: What does <!DOCTYPE html> declaration do?
practice.answer: Tells browser this is an HTML5 document

practice.question: Where does the page title go?
Why is meta charset="UTF-8" important?
practice.answer: Allows use of characters from any language

topics.title: Text Elements: Headings & Paragraphs
topics.english: HTML provides headings (h1-h6) for titles and paragraphs for text blocks. Text can be emphasized using strong and em tags.
topics.hinglish: HTML me headings (h1-h6) titles ke liye aur paragraphs text blocks ke liye hote hain. Text ko strong aur em se emphasize kar sakte hain.
examples:
Main Title

Subtitle

This is a paragraph with important text.

practice.question: How many heading levels does HTML have?
What's the difference between <strong> and <em> tags?

topics.title: Lists
topics.english: HTML provides ordered (numbered) and unordered (bulleted) lists using ol and ul tags with li for list items.
topics.hinglish: HTML me ordered (numbered) aur unordered (bulleted) lists hote hain - ol aur ul tags se, li items ke liye.

practice.question: What tag is used for unordered lists?
What tag is common to both ordered and unordered lists?

topics.title: Hyperlinks
topics.english: Hyperlinks connect web pages using <a> tag with href attribute. Can be absolute (external) or relative (internal).
topics.hinglish: Hyperlinks web pages ko connect karte hain <a> tag se, href attribute ke saath. Absolute (bahar) ya relative (andar) ho sakte hain.

practice.question: Which attribute is mandatory for hyperlinks?
What's the difference between absolute and relative links?
practice.answer: Absolute links use full URL, relative links use file path

topics.title: Images
topics.english: Images are added using self-closing tag with src and alt attributes. Alt text is crucial for accessibility.
topics.hinglish: Images add karne ke liye self-closing tag use karte hain, src aur alt attributes ke saath. Alt text accessibility ke liye important hai.

practice.question: Why is alt attribute important for images?
practice.answer: For accessibility, SEO, and when images don't load

topics.title: Semantic HTML
topics.english: Semantic tags describe the meaning of content. They improve SEO, accessibility, and code readability.
topics.hinglish: Semantic tags content ka meaning batate hain. Ye SEO, accessibility, aur code readability improve karte hain.

practice.question: What are semantic HTML tags?
practice.answer: Tags that describe content meaning (header, main, footer, etc.)

practice.question: Why use semantic tags instead of just div?
practice.answer: Better for SEO, accessibility, and code maintainability

practice.question: What does <main> tag represent?
practice.answer: The main content of the document

topics.title: DIV and SPAN Elements
topics.english: Div and span are generic containers when no semantic tag fits. Div is block-level, span is inline.
topics.hinglish: Jab koi semantic tag fit na ho, tab div aur span generic containers hain. Div block-level hai, span inline hai.

practice.question: What is the main purpose of <div> tag?
practice.answer: To group elements together for styling or organization

practice.question: Difference between div and span?
practice.answer: Div is block-level, span is inline

practice.question: When should you use span instead of strong/em?
practice.answer: When you need to style text without semantic emphasis

topics.title: Code Structure & Best Practices
topics.english: Proper indentation, semantic markup, and following conventions make HTML code maintainable and professional.
topics.hinglish: Sahi indentation, semantic markup, aur conventions follow karna HTML code ko maintainable aur professional banata hai.

practice.question: Why is indentation important in HTML?
practice.answer: Makes code readable for developers (browser ignores it)

practice.question: What tool is used for indentation?
Why should every image have alt text?
practice.answer: Accessibility for screen readers, SEO, and fallback when images fail to load

topics.title: Forms
topics.english: Forms are used to collect user input such as text, email, password and submit data to server.
topics.hinglish: Forms user se input lene ke liye use hote hain jaise text, email, password aur data server ko bhejne ke liye.

topics.title: Input Types
topics.english: HTML provides different input types for better user experience.
topics.hinglish: HTML me alag-alag input types hote hain better user experience ke liye.

practice.question: Which input type validates email automatically?

topics.title: Labels & Accessibility
topics.english: Labels improve form accessibility by linking text with inputs.
topics.hinglish: Labels accessibility improve karte hain input ke sath text link karke.

topics.title: Tables
topics.english: Tables display structured data using rows and columns.
topics.hinglish: Tables structured data ko rows aur columns me dikhate hain.

practice.question: Difference between th and td?
practice.answer: th is header cell, td is data cell

topics.title: Audio & Video
topics.english: HTML allows embedding audio and video without plugins.
topics.hinglish: HTML audio aur video bina plugin ke embed karne deta hai.

topics.title: iframe
topics.english: Iframe embeds another webpage inside current page.
topics.hinglish: Iframe ek webpage ko doosre webpage ke andar embed karta hai.

topics.title: Meta Tags
topics.english: Meta tags provide metadata like viewport, description and SEO info.
topics.hinglish: Meta tags browser aur search engine ko page ki information dete hain.

practice.question: Why is viewport meta tag important?

topics.title: HTML Accessibility (ARIA Basics)
topics.english: ARIA helps screen readers understand UI components.
topics.hinglish: ARIA screen readers ko UI samajhne me help karta hai.

topics.title: HTML Validation
topics.english: Validation checks HTML code for errors and standards compliance.
topics.hinglish: Validation HTML errors aur standards check karta hai.

practice.question: Why validate HTML?
practice.answer: To avoid bugs and ensure browser compatibility

topics.title: Performance & Best Practices
topics.english: Clean structure, proper tags and optimized assets improve performance.
topics.hinglish: Clean structure aur sahi tags performance improve karte hain.
